name: part_001
file: tmp_【＃癒月ちょこ誕生日LIVE】重大告知あり？！3Dお誕生日ライブ！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [uHtWZbAu7iE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco performs the song 'Choco♡Love' on stage.
Instrumental dance break during the performance.
MC section where Yuzuki Choco greets the audience and discusses her birthday live.
Yuzuki Choco performs a cover of 'Black Cherry' by Acid Black Cherry.

subtitles.original: 聞いてみて
subtitles.english: Please listen

subtitles.original: 感じてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to feel it

subtitles.original: 会いたいわすぐ飛んでって
subtitles.english: I want to see you, I'll fly to you right away

subtitles.original: 少し困るくらいおねだり
subtitles.english: Pleading just a little too much

subtitles.original: ちゃんと聞いてみて受け取って
subtitles.english: Please listen carefully and receive it

subtitles.original: 甘くとろけちゃうようなときを
subtitles.english: A time that's so sweet it melts

subtitles.original: 隣にいたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to be by your side

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 今日はチョコのお誕生日ライブ来てくださって
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to Choco's birthday live today!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 見てるー？
subtitles.english: Are you watching?

subtitles.original: いやね、実はね、
subtitles.english: Well, actually,

subtitles.original: 歌だけの3Dライブは実は初めてなんだけど
subtitles.english: it's actually my first time doing a 3D live with only singing,

subtitles.original: 一生懸命練習して、歌って踊って、
subtitles.english: but I practiced really hard, singing and dancing,

subtitles.original: みんなと最後まで楽しめたら、チョコすごい嬉しいな！
subtitles.english: and if I can enjoy it with everyone until the end, Choco would be so happy!

subtitles.original: へへっ！
subtitles.english: Hehe!

subtitles.original: なんと今回はゲストのみんなに行ってもらったり
subtitles.english: And this time, I'll have some guests...

subtitles.original: 最後に重大告知があるので、
subtitles.english: And there's a major announcement at the end,

subtitles.original: ぜひお楽しみに！
subtitles.english: so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: それでは、次の曲は、
subtitles.english: Now, for the next song,

subtitles.original: 実はね...
subtitles.english: actually...

subtitles.original: 次は、以前Twitterで
subtitles.english: For the next one, I previously

subtitles.original: チョコに歌ってほしい曲をリクエスト欲しい！ってツイートしたの
subtitles.english: posted on Twitter asking for song requests you want Choco to sing.

subtitles.original: ツイート覚えてるみんな？
subtitles.english: Do you all remember that tweet?

subtitles.original: 覚えてるかな？
subtitles.english: Do you remember?

subtitles.original: なんと、そのリクエスト曲の中からチョコ選んじゃった！
subtitles.english: I actually chose from those requested songs!

subtitles.original: ちょっと噛んだのは気にしないで！
subtitles.english: Don't mind me stumbling over my words a bit!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、
subtitles.english: Yes, so,

subtitles.original: 何が選ばれたのか予想してみてね。
subtitles.english: try to guess what was chosen.

subtitles.original: ねえ、何だと思う？何だと思う？
subtitles.english: Hey, what do you think? What do you think?

subtitles.original: ふむふむ、なるほどね。うんうん。
subtitles.english: Hmm, I see. Yeah, yeah.

subtitles.original: さあ、みんなの正解は当たってるのかー！
subtitles.english: Now, let's see if your answers are correct!

subtitles.original: 正解はこの曲です。
subtitles.english: The correct answer is this song.

subtitles.original: Moonlight shadow
subtitles.english: Moonlight shadow

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっち
subtitles.english: All alone

subtitles.original: 喉が渇いてただけなのよ
subtitles.english: I was just thirsty

subtitles.original: 囓り付いた
subtitles.english: I bit into it

subtitles.original: 囓る甘い病も毒だ
subtitles.english: The sweet sickness I bite is also poison

subtitles.original: 侵された
subtitles.english: I've been tainted

subtitles.original: Black Cherry 濡れた
subtitles.english: Black Cherry, soaked

subtitles.original: 堕ちて私の中へ
subtitles.english: Falling into me

subtitles.original: 種を残し 蘇れ
subtitles.english: Leave the seed and be reborn

subtitles.original: 愛してくれなくていいよ
subtitles.english: You don't have to love me

subtitles.original: 愛してないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't love you

subtitles.original: これ以上惨めにさせないで
subtitles.english: Don't make me any more miserable

subtitles.original: 二人のこのヒストリー
subtitles.english: This history of ours

subtitles.original: ちょっとした寄り道なの
subtitles.english: is just a little detour

subtitles.original: 心はまだミステリー
subtitles.english: My heart is still a mystery

subtitles.original: 抱かれた夜の数だけ流した涙
subtitles.english: Tears shed for as many nights as I was held

subtitles.original: 紅いルージュ シャツの跡
subtitles.english: Red rouge, marks on the shirt

subtitles.original: 言葉を飲み込み口付ける
subtitles.english: Swallowing the words and kissing

subtitles.original: 苦いシャワー 私じゃない香り知らない
subtitles.english: A bitter shower, I don't know the scent that isn't mine

subtitles.original: 押し殺し麻痺
subtitles.english: Suppressing it and getting paralyzed

subtitles.original: またエクスタシー Dirtyな最高
subtitles.english: Ecstasy again, a dirty high

subtitles.original: 折れた羽を震わせながら
subtitles.english: While trembling my broken wings

subtitles.original: 止めなきゃだ 噛みしめた唇
subtitles.english: I have to stop it, my bitten lips

subtitles.original: スローモーション飲み込まれ
subtitles.english: Being swallowed in slow motion

subtitles.original: Don't kiss me 離れないで
subtitles.english: Don't kiss me, don't leave me

subtitles.original: Don't kiss me でも許せない
subtitles.english: Don't kiss me, but I can't forgive you
